Food

With more than 8 million people in New York City, you'd expect some great chow and some culinary diversity â€“ and that's exactly what you get. The city manages to bring dishes from all over the world and make them its own. Ranging from desserts and snacks to full course meals, you can eat anything you crave with a little bit of traveling.
